rows.label: tev001801_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there, Chief! You get a new mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0002
rows.name:
If it's something good, can I help? Please?
Pleeeeeasepleasepleaseplease?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001801_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Mia to your team.

rows.label: tev001801_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001801_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Mia's request for now.

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0003
rows.name:
All right! I can't wait to show you how far I've come.
Your eyes are gonna spring right out of your head.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0004
rows.name: Awww, come on! You gotta take ol' Mia with you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0009
rows.name:
This is the moment BLADE has been waiting for.
We're going after the Lifehold Core,
and we're gonna WIN...for sure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey, and I bet you're the one leading the charge,
huh, Chief?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0011
rows.name:
Look, I'll shoot straight—you have to take me with you.
I've learned a lot, and I'm gonna put it to good use,
and you'll be so amazed you won't even believe it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001801_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Mia to your team.

rows.label: tev001801_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001801_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Mia's request for now.

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0012
rows.name:
I am psyched, Chief. PSYCHED!
We've got this baby in the bag.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0013
rows.name: Awww, come on! You gotta take ol' Mia with you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0018
rows.name:
Hey, so I know we achieved our main goal in securing
the Lifehold Core and all that jazz, which is good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0019
rows.name:
But there are still a metric ton of exciting things to see
here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0020
rows.name:
We can't stop now, Chief—we gotta roll crazy-style.
You and Mia still got all sorts of wacky adventures left![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001801_SEL0171
rows.name: Add Mia to your team.

rows.label: tev001801_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001801_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline Mia's request for now.

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0021
rows.name:
Then let's get our stuff together and go!
This is gonna be craaaaa-zy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001801_MSG0022
rows.name: Awww, come on! You gotta take ol' Mia with you![ST:wait ]
